page.title: 02LEISURE:PONTELAND PARK
page.content:
The park is fairly large. There is plenty of{wildlife}in the wooded park. There is a variety of flowers, for example violets, stitchwort, dandelion and a lot of birds like blue tit, black birds and coots. The main attraction is the{River Pont. There is also an assault course.The park is used by local people,tourists and people walking their dogs.
{THE PARK A light breeze blows in the tree, The birds sing on the branches. A thrush,a starling in the ash, The occasional dog barking. A dark bridge crossing the river, A daffodil swaying to and fro, The bank of the river crumbling away, Fishes jumping for air.
